name: Engineering Expertise
description: Ask questions pertaining to mechanical and engineering topics.

name: Talk Shop
description: Build rapport, and ask favours of other mechanics, salvagers, and workers.

name: Mech Acquisition
description: Track down and acquire specific Mech parts and Chassis.

name: Mass Field Maintenance
description: Repair 4 SP on target Mechs or Vehicles in the field.

name: If I cut this wire...
description: Damage Systems and Modules on target Mech.

name: Mass Field Repair
description: Repair target Systems and Modules in the field.

name: Jury Rig
description: Craft improvised equipment from everyday items.

name: Mech-Gyver
description: Craft Mech Systems and Modules from Scrap in the field.

name: Auto-Turret
description: Construct an Immobile Auto-Turret that can be fitted with Systems and Modules.

name: Union Engineer
description: Improved repair; gain an additional 4SP when using Repair abilities or Systems.

content.value: You have specialised in getting your hands dirty, you can patch up even the most brutally damaged Mechs with ease, even in the midst of conflict.

name: This one goes to 11...
description: Overcharge a Reactor beyond it’s initial capacity to gain additional Pushes.

name: Mass Energy Recharge
description: Restore 10 Energy Points to target Mechs in the field.

name: Tip Top Shape
description: Your Union Crawler no longer needs to pay upkeep and does not deteriorate.

name: The Full Works
description: Fully repair and restore a target Mech and all attached Systems and Modules.

name: Hacking Kit
description: Versatile tool for allowing Mech Module hacks on foot and vice-versa.

name: System and Software Hacker
description: Attempt to destroy Systems and Modules on target Mech.

name: Denial of Service Attack
description: Attempt to Shutdown target Mech in Range.

name: Well actually...
description: Ask questions about Systems, Modules, or Technology.

name: Techno Babble
description: Build rapport and ask favours of other Hackers and technophiles.

name: Holo Companion
description: Construct an intelligent, holographic A.I. companion, projected from a device on your person.

name: Bionic Senses
description: Gain integrated Thermal Optics, Zoom Optics, or IR Night Vision Optics.

name: Bionic Arms

content.value: You gain a set of bionic arms, surgically installed to any specification you desire. In addition, you can heal a Minor Injury during Downtime by spending 2 Tech 1 Scrap at any Crafting Bay. You also increase your Pilot's Max HP by 2.

description: Gain a set of integrated Bionic Arms. Gives an improved base attack.

name: Bionic Legs
description: Gain a set of integrated Bionic Legs. Gives improved base movement.

name: Trojan Horse
description: Gain control of a Mech in Range as if it were yours for 10 minutes.

name: Counter-Hacking
description: Attempt to use an Ability with the [[Hacking]] Trait as a Reaction to being hacked.

name: Worm
description: Hack multiple Mechs in Range with a complex worm virus.

name: Network Takeover
description: Hack the entire network of a settlement in range. Control it as you wish.

name: Spyware
description: Permanent and undetectable spyware you can install on a settlement’s network.

name: Squeeze it in
description: Temporariliy increase the cargo capacity of a Mech.

name: Expert Salvager
description: You are a dab hand at scouring the wastes for every piece of salvage.

name: Emergency Salvage Drop
description: Retrieve Chassis, Systems, Modules, Scrap, and Equipment from your Crawler.

name: Read a Person
description: Learn information about an NPC you’re conversing with.

name: Let's Make a Deal
description: Attempt to force a deal through on your terms using leverage.

name: No Job Too Big
description: When reduced to 0 HP or your Mech is reduced to 0 SP, take a Turn Action or Reaction.

name: Folk Song
description: Sing a song to set a mood for an audience of NPCs.

name: Behemoth
description: Intimidate opponents and force them to accept your demands or flee.

name: Valiant Speech
description: Inspire you allies with a rousing speech which heals and provides them with bonuses.

name: Beefcake
description: Increase your size and strength, as well as the size and strength of your Mech.

name: Mechapult Master

content.value: You have become a master of the sacred art of scrap flinging, making you highly versed at using the Mechapult System.

description: Improve your ability with the Mechapult System.

name: Can’t Stop, Won’t Stop
description: Gain a special charge attack. Damage is based on cargo carried.

name: Master Salvager
description: Restore destroyed Systems Modules, and Mechs to Damaged Condition.

name: Hauling All Day
description: Any Mech that you Pilot doubles its Structure Points and Cargo Capacity.

name: Gather Intelligence
description: Ask two questions about an area and recieve truthful answers.

name: Tail
description: Track a target without being seen.

name: Survey Drone
description: Gain a Survey Drone that can be equipped with Systems and Modules.

name: Silver Tongue
description: Glean what motivates an NPC and use it to convince them to do as you wish.

name: Forked Tongue
description: Lie with confidence and great skill to fool even the most insightful.

name: Persona
description: Disguise yourself and create a false identity.

name: You Shot First
description: Activate this to act first whenever initiative would be rolled.

name: Spotter
description: Chooose a target in range for an ally to make a free attack against.

name: Custom Sniper Rifle
description: Gain a specialised sniper rifle that only you can use.

name: Flashback
description: Activate to retroactively have a solution in place for the current situation.

name: Camo Suit
description: Gain the use of an advanced Camo Suit that will make you invisible for short periods of time.

name: Wingsuit
description: Gain a Wingsuit which allows you to fly.

name: Wasteland Celebrity
description: You are known and respected everywhere and can get assistance when required.

name: Teleport Beacon
description: Gain a beacon and controller. Activate the controller to be teleported to the beacon.

name: Charge
description: Charge a target within Range and make a Melee attack with bonus damage.

name: Overpower
description: Put and hold a target in a compromised position so that they gain the [[Vulnerable]] Trait.

name: Duel
description: Compel a target in Range to fight you in single combat.

name: Wastelander Rapport
description: Ask questions of locals and gain assistance when required.

name: Resourceful
description: Find resources in the wastes and limit the effects of environmental conditions.

name: Custom Missile Launcher
description: Gain a specialised Missile Launcher that only you can use.

name: Provoke
description: Taunt a target in Range to focus its attacks on you.

name: Tactical Retreat
description: Allow you and your allies to retreat safely to an adjacent Area.

name: Counterattack
description: Use as a reaction to make a single attack against the target that attacked you.

name: Critical Strike
description: Gain a ‘Nailed it’ result on attack rolls with a result of 19 - 20.

name: Defy Death
description: When reduced to 0 SP activate as a Reaction to be reduced to 1 SP instead.

name: Whirlwind Strike
description: Make an attack against all targets in Range with an equipped weapon.

name: Omega Strike
description: Coordinate an attack against a single target. You and each of your allies makes a free attack.

name: Steel Pact
description: Form a bond with a weapon. Gain an additional dice roll when attacking with that weapon.

name: Glanded Stims
description: Gain additional actions on your turn, with the risk that you could cause yourself harm.

name: Modular Face Implant
description: Install a Module interfaced directly to your brain.

name: Bionic Endoskeleton
description: You are now fully bionic, your HP is now SP.

name: Meld Form
description: You are now Meld. You can replicate Equipment and make Meld Tendril attacks.

name: Ascension
description: You are now a virtual being. You control your Mech by wire, and can project your image holographically.

name: Field Fabrication
description: Create Systems, Modules and Mech Chassis in the field.

name: Miniaturised EMP
description: Gain a mini-EMP that when activated shuts down all electronics in Close Range for 10 mins.

name: Chassis Modder
description: Modify your Mech Chassis to gain the Chassis Ability of another Mech in addition to its own.

name: System Miniaturisation
description: Make Systems smaller to take up fewer slots and be usable as Pilot Equipment.

name: Droned Mech Conversion
description: Your Mech can be piloted remotely up to Far range.

name: Mecha Companion
description: Gain a robot familiar. It can be equipped with Systems and Modules.

name: Snipe
description: Deal double damage on your next ranged weapon attack if it hits.

name: Infiltration
description: Sneak into compounds, settlements and arcos to perform acts of espionage.

name: Mecha Packmaster
description: Gain a second Mecha Companion in addition to your first.

name: One with the Wastelands
description: Ask questions, gain favours and easily navigate the wastes.

name: Black Market
description: Gain access to a range of contraband Systems, Modules, and Pilot Equipment.

name: Pray I don’t alter the deal further...
actions: Pray I don’t alter the deal further...
description: Retroactively change the terms of a deal you’ve agreed.

name: Hidden Stash
description: Smuggle contraband into even the most secure areas.

name: Knife Missile
description: Gain a Knife Missile, a small floating assassination device you control.

name: Stealth Field Generator
description: This makes you and everything in Close range invisible indefinitely.

name: Union Representative
description: Gain access to and ask questions about settlements and arcos.

name: Union Call
description: Direct other Pilots to carry out missions in exchange for a Scrap reward.

name: Recruit
description: Command an NPC follower who will assist you in your missions.

name: VIP Beacon
description: Place a distress beacon to call for aid, which arrives quickly and heavily armed.

name: Inspirational Union Leader
description: Inspire your allies and refresh their HP, AP, and heal their minor injuries.

name: Area Salvage
description: You salvage an area for scrap. This could be an abandoned factory, a ruined settlement, or a crumbling research facility. The Mediator will tell you if an area can be Area Salvaged or not. It costs 1 AP for a Pilot or 1 EP in a Mech.

name: Mech Salvage
description: You salvage a destroyed Mech Chassis for Scrap and Systems.

name: Scrap
description: You break down a Mech Chassis, System, or Module into Scrap.

name: Repair
description: You repair a damaged Mech Chassis, System, or Module.

name: Craft
description: You craft a Mech Chassis, System, or Module.
